block.name: Integrate
block.doc: Implements an integrator. The output is the sum of the current and all previous input samples.

param.name: IO Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output streams.

option.name: Complex
option.doc: Input and output streams are complex.

option.name: Float
option.doc: Input and output streams are real.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Input and output streams are 32-bit integers.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Input and output streams are 16-bit integers.

param.name: Decimation
param.doc: Specifies the decimation factor at the output.
